net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns Namespace

Interfaces

NameModifierSummary
IAddOnpublic abstractOutput add-on interface. Add-on is a functionality extending the output generator at defined extension points. Implementing class must have a constructor with single OutputOptions parameter.

Go to namespaces or types

IAddOn Interface

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: AddOns\IAddOn.cs

Output add-on interface. Add-on is a functionality extending the output generator at defined extension points. Implementing class must have a constructor with single OutputOptions parameter.

public interface IAddOn

Implemented by: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.SourceOnlyPackages.SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn

Remarks

One instance per application run is created at GetAddOns() when a master switch in configuration Output.EnableAddOns is on (false by default) Add-on:

  • Can extend the code model root data - when PriorityRootData > 0
  • Can extend the index page - when PriorityIndexPage > 0
  • Can generate own pages - when PriorityOwnPages > 0
  • Can extend "standard" pages' header - when PriorityPageHeader > 0
  • Can extend "standard" pages' body - when PriorityPageBody > 0
  • Can extend "standard" pages' footer - when PriorityPageFooter > 0
The add-ons are applied in the order given by priority defined for each extension point within the add-on.

Properties

NameModifierSummary
PriorityIndexPagepublic abstractAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to the (main) index page. Value <1 means no output generated by add-on
PriorityOwnPagespublic abstractAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output pages. Value <1 means no output generated by add-on
PriorityPageBodypublic abstractAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page body. Value <1 means no output generated by add-on
PriorityPageFooterpublic abstractAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page footer. Value <1 means no output generated by add-on
PriorityPageHeaderpublic abstractAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page header. Value <1 means no output generated by add-on
PriorityRootDatapublic abstractAdd-on priority for processing the add-on data as a part of RootMember constructor. Value <1 means no processing

Methods

NameModifierSummary
ProcessRootData(RootMember, RootMemberBuilder)public abstractLet the add-on to prepare it's own data as a part of RootMember constructor.
WriteIndexAsync(RootMember, IMarkupProvider)public abstractWrites to the index (main) page of the code model
WriteOwnPagesAsync(RootMember, IMarkupProvider, MarkupGenerator)public abstractWrites the add-on pages into the output
WritePageBodyAsync(Member, IMarkupProvider)public abstractWrites the body fro the code model member
WritePageFooter(string, IMarkupProvider)public abstractWrites the footer for the code model member page
WritePageHeader(Member, IMarkupProvider)public abstractWrites the header for the code model member page

Go to namespaces or types

Classes

SourceOnlyPackagesAddOnpublicOutput generator add-on for documenting the source-only packages

Go to namespaces or types

SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.SourceOnlyPackages
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: AddOns\SourceOnlyPackages\SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn.cs

Output generator add-on for documenting the source-only packages

public class SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn : IAddOn

Inheritance: object
Implements: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn

Properties

NameModifierSummary
MembersBySourceOnlyPackagepublicDictionary of members by source-only package
OutputOptionspublicOutput configuration
PriorityIndexPagepublicAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to the (main) index page. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 1
PriorityOwnPagespublicAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output pages. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 1
PriorityPageBodypublicAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page body. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 0, so no output will be generator to member page body
PriorityPageFooterpublicAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page footer. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 1
PriorityPageHeaderpublicAdd-on priority for generating the add-on output to header of code model member page header. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 1
PriorityRootDatapublicAdd-on priority for processing the add-on data as a part of RootMember constructor. SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn priority is 1
SourceOnlyPackagespublicList of source-only packages' properties
SourceOnlyPackagesByMemberpublicDictionary of source-only packages by member

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
SourceOnlyPackagesAddOn(OutputOptions)publicCTOR - initialize add-on

Methods

NameModifierSummary
GetPackageAnchor(NuProps)privateReturns the anchor for given package within the package page(s) file.
GetPackagePageFileName(NuProps)privateReturns the name of the generated file (without extension) for package when the split by type is set, so the all package pages are generated into dedicated files.
GetPackagePagesFileName()privateReturns the name of the generated file (without extension) when the split by namespace is set, so the all package pages are generated into single file.
Link(string, NuProps, IMarkupProvider)privateCreates the link to the package page
ProcessRootData(RootMember, RootMemberBuilder)publicLet the add-on to prepare it's own data as a part of RootMember constructor.
WriteIndexAsync(RootMember, IMarkupProvider)publicWrites the table of all source-only packages within the code model into the output
WriteOwnPagesAsync(RootMember, IMarkupProvider, MarkupGenerator)publicWrites the source-only packages pages into the output
WritePageBodyAsync(Member, IMarkupProvider)publicWrites the body fro the code model member
WritePageFooter(string, IMarkupProvider)publicWrites to the footer for the code model member page
WritePageHeader(Member, IMarkupProvider)publicWrites the header for the code model member

Go to namespaces or types

Remarks

The add-on checks all compilation files for the <NuProp.xxx> comments with source-only package metadata and builds the list of source-only packages and the indexes between the packages and code model members.

net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.SourceOnlyPackages.Model Namespace

Classes

NameModifierSummary
NuPropspublicMetadata defining the source-only NuGet packages generated from the source code using the customized build process
NuProps.NuPropUsingpublicMetadata from <NuProp.Using id = "" version=""/> XML documentation comment

NuProps.IncludesTypeEnumpublicDefinition of the additional files to include into the source-only package

Go to namespaces or types

NuProps Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.SourceOnlyPackages.Model
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: AddOns\SourceOnlyPackages\Model\NuProps.cs

Metadata defining the source-only NuGet packages generated from the source code using the customized build process

public class NuProps

Inheritance: object

Remarks

Source-only NuGet packages contain just the source code that is added to the project the package is added to. The package is created from the (partial) class or classes in the project folder based on the metadata provided as special XML Documentation Comments.

  • <NuProp.Id></NuProp.Id> - package ID (mandatory)
  • <NuProp.Version></NuProp.Version> - package version base (major.minor.patch) - optional
  • <NuProp.Description></NuProp.Description> - package description (optional)
  • <NuProp.Tags></NuProp.Tags> - package tags (optional)
  • <NuProp.Includes type = "" /> - file includes (optional). If type="Folder", the package will include all compile files in folder, if type="FolderRecursive" the subfolders will be also included
  • <NuProp.Using id = "" version=""/> - package imports (optional). Version is optional
  • <NuProp.Needs id="" /> - "external" imports needed (optional) - not included in package, just info when consuming!!!

Properties

NameModifierSummary
DeclaringFilepublicFull path to the file declaring the source-only package (containing the package metadata as <NuProp.xxxx/> XML documentation comments
ExternalReferencespublicList of external references (NuGet package dependencies) that are not declared in the package, but the consumer has to include
HasNuPropspublicMaster flag whether the NuProps class containts the valid metadata for source-only package
IncludesTypepublicDefinition of the additional files to include into the source-only package
PackageDescriptionpublicOptional description of the package
PackageFilespublicList of all files to be included into the source-only package
PackageIdpublicUnique ID of the package
PackageTagspublicOptional package tags divided by space
PackageVersionpublicOptional version of the package.
UsingspublicList of the dependencied that are to be declared within the package

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
NuProps(string, IReadOnlyCollection<string>)publicCTOR - Checks the compilation file with given fileName for the source-only package metadata. When the metadata are present and valid, the NuProps object is initialized and HasNuProps property is set to true

Go to namespaces or types

Sources: AddOns\SourceOnlyPackages\Model\NuProps.cs

Definition of the additional files to include into the source-only package

public enum NuProps.IncludesTypeEnum: int

Inheritance: object -> ValueType -> Enum
Implements: System.IComparable, System.IFormattable, System.IConvertible

Constants

NameValueSummary
None0Don't include any other files (only the file defining the source-only package will be included)
Folder1Include all compilation files from the same folder where the file defining the source-only package is stored
FolderRecursive2Include all compilation files from the same folder where the file defining the source-only package is stored and the subfolders

net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel Namespace

Code model related classes

Classes

NameModifierSummary
AssemblyMemberpublicRepresents an assembly within the code model
EventMemberpublicRepresents an event within the code model
FieldMemberpublicRepresents a field within the code model
Memberpublic abstractRepresents a single entity of the code model - called member. The member can be namespace, type, type member like field, method (aka type code member) , etc.
MethodMemberpublicRepresents a method within the code model
MethodParameterpublicRepresents a method parameter within the code model
NamespaceMemberpublicRepresents a namespace within the code model
PropertyMemberpublicRepresents a property within the code model
RootMemberpublicRepresents a root of the code model
RootMember.ProcessingInfoContainerpublicProcessing information
TypeContentMemberpublic abstractAbstract class for type members (fields, properties, etc.) within the code model
TypeMemberpublicRepresents a type within the code model
TypeParameterpublicRepresents a type parameter within the code model
TypeRefpublicType reference - used to hold the reference to the type from the commented code as we as the referenced/used types. There is only single TypeRef for a type even if used on multiple "places"

NameModifierSummary
GetConstantValueString()publicGets the constant value as string with "code syntax" (meaning how would be the value defined in the code)

Go to namespaces or types

FieldMember.ConstantValue Property

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: FieldMember
Sources: CodeModel\FieldMember.cs

The constant value of the field

public object ConstantValue { get; }

Property value

object

Remarks

The ConstantValue is not the definition (for example "2+customId") but the value is evaluated to the target type (for example 1002 if the customId in previous example is constant 1000). It's also necessary to apply the format when the constant value is to be presented in the output (for example add quotation marks to strings)

Go to namespaces or types

FieldMember.IsConst Property

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc

FieldMember.GetConstantValueString() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: FieldMember
Sources: CodeModel\FieldMember.cs

Gets the constant value as string with "code syntax" (meaning how would be the value defined in the code)

public string GetConstantValueString()

Return value

string
The constant value constant

Remarks

The constant value is stored as the object, so it's necessary to do some formatting like add the quotation marks for strings, format the numeric constants, etc.

Go to namespaces or types

Member Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Member.cs

Represents a single entity of the code model - called member. The member can be namespace, type, type member like field, method (aka type code member) , etc.

public abstract class Member

Inheritance: object
Derived: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.AssemblyMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.NamespaceMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.RootMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeContentMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember

Remarks

The code model should not be manipulated (changed) once built, however for the sake of the simplicity, the setters are currently kept public. This might change in future when (if) the MarkupDoc will come with greater extensibility

Constants

NameValueSummary
Base36Chars0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzCharacters allowed in Base36 encoding

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AllMemberspublicAll child members, for example types for namespace; fields, properties, methods, etc. for types
AnchorpublicAnchor to the member to point the links (FileName.extension#Anchor) to proper part of generated output file.
AssemblypublicReference to the containing assembly member
AttributespublicMember's attributes definition (including the parameters).
AttributeTypeRefspublicTypes (type references) of the member attributes
DocumentationpublicParsed XML documentation comments. Documentation is the root element of the parsed XML documentation comments
DocumentationIdpublicMember's documentation ID as provided by the compiler (for example M:myNamespace.myType.myMethod)
DocumentationXmlpublicXML documentation comments
FileNamepublicFile name (without extension !!!) where the member should be generated to (aka split name) in case that the output splitting is allowed, otherwise the empty string. This is also used when building the links to the member (FileName.extension#Anchor)
IdpublicMember id, used to distinguish between the names when building the "internal" links (for example when ti difference is in case only)
IsAbstractpublicFlag whether the member is abstract
IsExternpublicFlag whether the member is extern
IsNewpublicFlag whether the member hides member with the same name in base class
IsOverridepublicFlag whether the member overrides the member in the base class
IsSealedpublicFlag whether the member is sealed
IsStaticpublicFlag whether the member is static
IsVirtualpublicFlag whether the member is virtual (can be overriden)
MemberKindpublicKind (type) of the member
ModifierpublicMember modifier (public, private, etc.)
NamepublicName of the member as presented in generated output
NameBasepublicName of the member without type params, indexer params, operator params, etc.
NamespacepublicReference to the containing namespace member
RootpublicReference to the root of the code model
SourceFilespublicSource file defining the member
SymbolpublicRoslyn semantic analysis symbol of the member

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
Member(MemberBuilder)protectedCTOR - from builder

Methods

NameModifierSummary
Base36(uint)public staticEncodes the input number to Base36 encoded string
FormatAnchor()protectedCreates and format the anchor based on the DocumentationId . In general, it gets the DocumentationID, trims is, converts it to lower case and replaces the "special" characters with '_' or '-'
StableHash(string)public staticHashing function for strings that generates the sting hash as System.UInt32
ToString()publicReturns the brief description of the member

Go to namespaces or types

private const string Base36Chars = "0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"

Go to namespaces or types

Member.Id Property

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: Member
Sources: CodeModel\Member.cs

Member id, used to distinguish between the names when building the "internal" links (for example when ti difference is in case only)

public string Id { get; }

Property value

string

Remarks

Id is not necessary unique across all members, but the combination Name + Id is believed to be unique.

The Id is created/updated when the DocumentationId is set and it's calculated as Base36 encoded hash of the DocumentationId

Member.FormatAnchor() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: Member
Sources: CodeModel\Member.cs

Creates and format the anchor based on the DocumentationId . In general, it gets the DocumentationID, trims is, converts it to lower case and replaces the "special" characters with '_' or '-'

protected string FormatAnchor()

Return value

string
The anchor for the member

Go to namespaces or types

Member.StableHash(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: Member
Sources: CodeModel\Member.cs

Hashing function for strings that generates the sting hash as System.UInt32

public static uint StableHash(string s)
Method parameters
string s
String to hash

Return value

uint
Hash of given string

Remarks

The hash function is based on the .NET implementation of System.String.GetHashCode optimized for 64bit processors. The reason for the explicit hash function is that the .NET implementation is not granted to be stable across versions and/or frameworks. The stability is needed as the Base36 encoded hash is a part of the file name and may be used in perma links

Go to namespaces or types

Member.ToString() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: Member
Sources: CodeModel\Member.cs

Returns the brief description of the member

public override string ToString()

Return value

string
The brief description of the member
Overrides: object.ToString

Go to namespaces or types

MethodParameter Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\MethodParameter.cs

Represents a method parameter within the code model

public class MethodParameter

Inheritance: object

Remarks

Used for delegate parameters as well as the delegate is actually a type encapsulating the Invoke method

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AttributespublicParameter attributes definition (including the parameters).
ExplicitDefaultValuepublicParameter's explicitly defined default value (when available)
HasExplicitDefaultValuepublicFlag whether the parameter has explicitly defined default value
IsOptionalpublicFlag whether the parameter is optional
IsParamspublicFlag whether the parameter is with params modifier
IsThispublicFlag whether the parameter is with this modifier
NamepublicName of the parameter
RefKindpublicInformation whether the parameter is "by reference" with the reference kind (None, Ref, Out,In)
TypeRefpublicType reference for the parameter's type

Constructors

MethodParameter.GetDefaultValueString() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MethodParameter
Sources: CodeModel\MethodParameter.cs

Gets the default value for the parameter as string with "code syntax" (meaning how would be the value defined in the code)

public string GetDefaultValueString()

Return value

string
The default value for the parameter or empty string if not defined

Remarks

The default value is stored as the object, so it's necessary to do some formatting like add the quotation marks for strings, format the numeric constants, etc.

Go to namespaces or types

PropertyMember Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\PropertyMember.cs

Represents a property within the code model

public class PropertyMember : TypeContentMember

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Member -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeContentMember

Properties

NameModifierSummary
GetterModifierpublicGetter access modifier if it's different than the property one
IsIndexerpublicFlag whether the property is indexer;
IsReadOnlypublicFlag whether the property is read only
IsWriteOnlypublicFlag whether the property is write only
ParameterspublicList of property parameters (if any). Just the indexers may have the parameters
SetterModifierpublicSetter access modifier if it's different than the property one
TypeRefpublicType reference of property type

RootMember Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\RootMember.cs

Represents a root of the code model

public class RootMember : Member

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Member

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AddOnspublicOptional list of add-ons
AllMembersByDocIdpublicDictionary of all members by their documentation ID
AllMembersBySourceFilepublicDictionary of all members by their source file
AllMembersBySymbolpublicDictionary of all members by their Roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ISymbol
AllNamespacespublicList of namespaces within the code model
AllTypeRefspublicList of all type references used within the code model
AllTypespublicList of all types (including interfaces, delegates, etc.) defined within the code model
AssembliespublicList of all assemblies defined within the code model
ProcessingInfopublicProcessing information. This is the only part that can be modified after the code model is built as it's used to adjust the behavior during the processing within markup generator
ProjectRootDirpublicFull path to the project root directory
TypeImplementsInterfaceListpublicList of all direct and indirect interface-implementation type pairs
TypeInheritsFromTypeListpublicList of all inheritance pairs (member, parent)

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
RootMember(RootMemberBuilder, IEnumerable<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn>)publicCTOR - from builder

Methods

NameModifierSummary
AddOnsSelector(Func<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn,int>)publicReturn list of add-ons having the prioritySelector > 0 ordered by the priority. When no add-ons applies, the empty list is returned
GetDerivedTypeMembers(TypeMember)publicGets the inherited (children) type members of given type
GetParentTypeMember(TypeMember)publicGets the parent TypeMember of given type
GetTypeMembersImplementingInterface(TypeMember)publicGets the type members implementing type (interface)

Type: RootMember

public RootMember(RootMemberBuilder builder, IEnumerable<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn> addOns)
Constructor parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder builder
Builder
IEnumerable<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn> addOns
Optional list of add-ons

Remarks

Use the RootMember to build the whole code model hierarchy from the RootMemberBuilder that contains such hierarchy and the details about individual entities

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: RootMember
Sources: CodeModel\RootMember.cs

Return list of add-ons having the prioritySelector > 0 ordered by the priority. When no add-ons applies, the empty list is returned

Method parameters
System.Func<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn,int> prioritySelector
Priority selector

Return value

IReadOnlyList<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn>
List of add-ons having the prioritySelector > 0 ordered by the priority

Go to namespaces or types

RootMember.GetDerivedTypeMembers(TypeMember) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: RootMember
Sources: CodeModel\RootMember.cs

Gets the inherited (children) type members of given type

public IReadOnlyList<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember> GetDerivedTypeMembers(TypeMember type)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember type
Type to get the parent for

Return value

IReadOnlyList<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember>
List of inherited (children) type members of given type

Remarks

This method should not be used to generic check for the inheritance. It's intended to get the children existing within the project being documented! When the child of type is not defined within project, there is no corresponding TypeMember and such inheritance info will not be part of the list returned

Go to namespaces or types

RootMember.GetParentTypeMember(TypeMember) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: RootMember
Sources: CodeModel\RootMember.cs

Gets the parent TypeMember of given type

public TypeMember GetParentTypeMember(TypeMember type)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember type
Type to get the parent for

Return value

net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember
The parent TypeMember of given type or null

Remarks

This method should not be used to generic check for the inheritance. It's intended to get the parent existing within the project being documented! When the parent of type is not defined within project, there is no TypeMember for the parent and the returned value will be null.

Go to namespaces or types

RootMember.GetTypeMembersImplementingInterface(TypeMember) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: RootMember
Sources: CodeModel\RootMember.cs

Gets the type members implementing type (interface)

public IReadOnlyList<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember> GetTypeMembersImplementingInterface(TypeMember type)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember type
Interface to get the implementations for

Return value

IReadOnlyList<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeMember>
List of type members implementing type (interface)

Remarks

This method should not be used to generic check for the interface implementation. It's intended to get the "in-project" type members implementing given interface. When the interface is implemented by type that is not defined within project, there is no corresponding TypeMember and such implemented interface info will not be part of the list returned

Go to namespaces or types

TypeContentMember Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\TypeContentMember.cs

Abstract class for type members (fields, properties, etc.) within the code model

public abstract class TypeContentMember : Member

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Member
Derived: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.EventMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.FieldMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.MethodMember, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.PropertyMember

Properties

NameModifierSummary
ExplicitInterfaceImplementationMemberSymbolpublicSymbol of explicitly implemented interface member
FileNamepublicFile name (without extension !!!) where the member should be generated to (aka split name) in case that the output splitting is allowed, otherwise the empty string. This is also used when building the links to the member (FileName.extension#Anchor)
ImplementsMemberspublicMembers implemented by this member (if any)
ImplementsSymbolspublicSymbols of members implemented by this member (if any)
OverridesMemberpublicMember overriden by this member (if any)
OverridesSymbolpublicSymbol of member overriden by this member (if any)
TypepublicType containing the content member

Constructors

NameModifierSummary

TypeContentMember.FileName Property

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: TypeContentMember
Sources: CodeModel\TypeContentMember.cs

File name (without extension !!!) where the member should be generated to (aka split name) in case that the output splitting is allowed, otherwise the empty string. This is also used when building the links to the member (FileName.extension#Anchor)

public override string FileName { get; }

Property value

string
Overrides: Member.FileName

Remarks

Type content is rendered together with type, so the FileName is taken from Type

Remarks

TypeMember Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\TypeMember.cs

Represents a type within the code model

public class TypeMember : Member

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Member

Fields

NameModifierSummary
DelegateParameterspublicDelegate parameters for delegate types
DelegateReturnTypepublicType reference for delegate return type
TypeParameterspublicType parameters for generic types

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AllInterfacesTypeRefspublicType references for all implemented interfaces (both directly implemented and inherited)
ConstructorspublicAll constructors defined within the type
ConversionspublicAll conversions defined within the type
DestructorpublicDestructor defined within the type or null if none
EventspublicAll events defined within the type
FieldspublicAll fields defined within the type
FileNamepublicFile name (without extension !!!) where the type should be generated to (aka split name) in case that the output splitting is allowed, otherwise the empty string. This is used when building the links to the member (FileName.extension#Anchor)
FullNamepublicType full name (namespace.type)
ImplementsAnyInterfacepublicFlag whether the type implements any (at least one) interface
InterfaceImplementationsByInterfaceMemberpublicDictionary of interface member implementation by interface member (key=interface member symbol, value=implementation member symbol)
InterfaceMembersByInterfaceImplementationpublicDictionary of implemented interface members by implementation member (key=implementation member symbol, value=interface member symbol)
InterfacesTypeRefspublicType references for directly implemented interfaces
IsDelegatepublicFlag whether type is delegate
IsGenericpublicFlag whether type is generic
IsInheritedpublicFlag whether the type is inherited (applicable to classes only)
MethodspublicAll methods defined within the type
OperatorspublicAll operators defined within the type
OperatorsAndConversionspublicAll operators and conversions defined within the type
PropertiespublicAll properties defined within the type
TypeKindpublicType kind (class, interface, ...)
TypeRefpublicType reference for this type

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
TypeMember(TypeMemberBuilder)publicCTOR - from builder

Methods

NameModifierSummary
ToString()publicReturns the brief description of the type

TypeParameter Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel

Sources: CodeModel\TypeParameter.cs

Represents a type parameter within the code model

public class TypeParameter

Inheritance: object

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AttributespublicType parameter attributes definition (including the parameters).
ConstraintTypespublicList of type references of constraint types when the concrete types are defined as constraints
HasAnyConstraintpublicFlag whether the type parameter has any constraint
HasConstructorConstraintpublicFlag whether the type parameter has constructor constraint ( new() )
HasReferenceTypeConstraintpublicFlag whether the type parameter has reference type constraint ( class )
HasUnmanagedTypeConstraintpublicFlag whether the type parameter has unmanaged type constraint ( unmanaged )
HasValueTypeConstraintpublicFlag whether the type parameter has value type constraint ( struct )
NamepublicName of the parameter
VariancepublicVariance (covariance and contravariance) modifier (in, out) for the type parameter if available.

NameModifierSummary

NameModifierSummary

TypeRef Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\TypeRef.cs

Type reference - used to hold the reference to the type from the commented code as we as the referenced/used types. There is only single TypeRef for a type even if used on multiple "places"

public class TypeRef

Inheritance: object

Properties

NameModifierSummary
ArrayElementTypepublicType reference of array element type when available
BasepublicBase (parent) type when available
BaseExclObjectpublicBase (parent) type excluding the System.Object, when available
DocumentationIdpublicDocumentation ID of type when available
EnumValueTypepublicUnderlying value type name for enums
GenericAritypublicGeneric type arity (number of type parameters) when available
GenericBaseNamepublicBase name (without the type parameters) for generic types
GenericDefinitionpublicBase generic type when available - used for the types that have applied generic parameters. In such case, GenericDefinition refers to the "original" type
MemberpublicCorresponding type member from the code model when available
NamepublicName of the type
NamespacepublicContaining namespace of type

Methods

NameModifierSummary
ApplySpecialName(bool)publicApplies the type special name for the current type reference
ApplySpecialName(ITypeSymbol, bool)public staticApplies the type special name for given typeSymbol
ApplySpecialName(string, string, bool)private staticApplies the type special name for given type described by namespace and name
GetOrCreate(ITypeSymbol, RootMemberBuilder)public staticGets the TypeRef from the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol . When such TypeRef doesn't exist yet, it's created.
ToString()publicGets the brief description - name - of the type reference

TypeRef.ApplySpecialName(bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: TypeRef
Sources: CodeModel\TypeRef.cs

Applies the type special name for the current type reference

public string ApplySpecialName(bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial = true)
Method parameters
bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial
Include the namespace to the output in case that the special name is not applicable

Return value

string
Special name of the type or original name (with or without namespace as defined by includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial ) when the special name is not applicable

Remarks

See ApplySpecialName(string, string, bool) for details

Go to namespaces or types

TypeRef.ApplySpecialName(ITypeSymbol, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: TypeRef
Sources: CodeModel\TypeRef.cs

Applies the type special name for given typeSymbol

public static string ApplySpecialName(ITypeSymbol typeSymbol, bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial = true)
Method parameters
Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol typeSymbol
bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial
Include the namespace to the output in case that the special name is not applicable

Return value

string
Special name of the type or original name (with or without namespace as defined by includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial ) when the special name is not applicable

Remarks

See ApplySpecialName(string, string, bool) for details

Go to namespaces or types

TypeRef.ApplySpecialName(string, string, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: TypeRef
Sources: CodeModel\TypeRef.cs

Applies the type special name for given type described by namespace and name

private static string ApplySpecialName(string ns, string name, bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial = true)
Method parameters
string ns
Namespace containing the type
string name
Name of the type
bool includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial
Include the namespace to the output in case that the special name is not applicable

Return value

string
Special name of the type or original name (with or without namespace as defined by includeNamespaceIfNotSpecial ) when the special name is not applicable

Remarks

Special name is actually the simplified and/or common name for selected types. For example "string" for "System.String", "bool" for "System.Boolean", "int" for "System.Int32". The simplification means removing the well known namespace (System, System.Collections, ...), using the common name for some types (bool, int, double, ...), replacing Nullable<T> with "T?" syntax.

Special names for System namespace: bool, byte, char, DateTime, decimal, double, Enum, IAsyncResult, IDisposable, short, int, long, object, sbyte, float, string, ushort, uint, ulong, void, Delegate, MulticastDelegate, ValueType, Attribute.

Special names for System.Collections.Generic namespace: ICollection, IDictionary, IEnumerable, IEnumerator, IList, IReadOnlyCollection, IReadOnlyList, List, Dictionary, HashSet, Queue, Stack (all as generics).

Special names for System.Collections namespace: ICollection, IDictionary, IEnumerable, IDictionary, IEnumerator, IList, Hashtable, Queue, Stack, ArrayList, SortedList.

Go to namespaces or types

TypeRef.GetOrCreate(ITypeSymbol, RootMemberBuilder) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: TypeRef
Sources: CodeModel\TypeRef.cs

Gets the TypeRef from the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol . When such TypeRef doesn't exist yet, it's created.

public static TypeRef GetOrCreate(ITypeSymbol symbol, RootMemberBuilder root)
Method parameters
Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeSymbol symbol
Type symbol to get the TypeRef for
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder root
Root builder keeping the list of all type references

Return value

net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeRef
TypeRef corresponding to the symbol

Remarks

The list of existing type references is held by RootMemberBuilder .

MethodKindEnum Enum

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Enums.cs

Possible kinds of method symbols

public enum MethodKindEnum: int

Inheritance: object -> ValueType -> Enum
Implements: System.IComparable, System.IFormattable, System.IConvertible

Constants

NameValueSummary
AnonymousFunction0An anonymous method or lambda expression
LambdaMethod0
Constructor1Method is a constructor.
Conversion2Method is a conversion.
DelegateInvoke3Method is a delegate invoke.
Destructor4Method is a destructor.
EventAdd5Method is an event add.
EventRaise6Method is an event raise.
EventRemove7Method is an event remove.
ExplicitInterfaceImplementation8Method is an explicit interface implementation.
UserDefinedOperator9Method is an operator.
Ordinary10Method is an ordinary method.
PropertyGet11Method is a property get.
PropertySet12Method is a property set.
ReducedExtension13An extension method with the "this" parameter removed.
SharedConstructor14
StaticConstructor14Method is a static constructor.
BuiltinOperator15A built-in operator.
DeclareMethod16Declare Sub or Function.
LocalFunction17Method is declared inside of another method.

Builder for FieldMember

public class FieldMemberBuilder : TypeContentMemberBuilder

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.MemberBuilder -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.TypeContentMemberBuilder

Go to namespaces or types

FieldMemberBuilder.ConstantValue Property

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: FieldMemberBuilder
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\FieldMemberBuilder.cs

The constant value of the field

public object ConstantValue { get; set; }

Property value

object

Remarks

The ConstantValue is not the definition (for example "2+customId") but the value is evaluated to the target type (for example 1002 if the customId in previous example is constant 1000). It's also necessary to apply the format when the constant value is to be presented in the output (for example add quotation marks to strings)

Go to namespaces or types

MemberBuilder Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\MemberBuilder.cs

Builder for Member

public abstract class MemberBuilder

Inheritance: object
Derived: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.AssemblyMemberBuilder, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.NamespaceMemberBuilder, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.TypeContentMemberBuilder, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.TypeMemberBuilder

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AssemblypublicReference to the containing assembly member
AttributespublicMember's attributes definition (including the parameters).
AttributeTypeRefspublicTypes (type references) of the member attributes
DocumentationpublicParsed XML documentation comments. Documentation is the root element of the parsed XML documentation comments
DocumentationIdpublicMember's documentation ID as provided by the compiler (for example M:myNamespace.myType.myMethod)
DocumentationXmlpublicXML documentation comments
IsAbstractpublicFlag whether the member is abstract
IsExternpublicFlag whether the member is extern
IsNewpublicFlag whether the member hides member with the same name in base class
IsOverridepublicFlag whether the member overrides the member in the base class
IsSealedpublicFlag whether the member is sealed
IsStaticpublicFlag whether the member is static
IsVirtualpublicFlag whether the member is virtual (can be overriden)
MemberKindpublicKind (type) of the member
ModifierpublicMember modifier (public, private, etc.)
NamepublicName of the member as presented in generated output
NameBasepublicName of the member without type params, indexer params, operator params, etc.
NamespacepublicReference to the containing namespace member
RootpublicReference to the root of the code model
SourceFilespublicSource file defining the symbol
SymbolpublicRoslyn semantic analysis symbol of the member

Methods

NameModifierSummary
SetAttributes(RootMemberBuilder)publicSets the member's Attributes and AttributeTypeRefs

MethodMemberBuilder Class

Builder for MethodMember

public class MethodMemberBuilder : TypeContentMemberBuilder

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.MemberBuilder -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.TypeContentMemberBuilder

Properties

NameModifierSummary
IsAsyncpublicFlag whether the method is async
IsConstructorpublicFlag whether the method is construction
IsDestructorpublicFlag whether the method is destructor
IsExtensionMethodpublicFlag whether the method is extension method
IsGenericpublicFlag whether method is generic
MemberKindpublicKind (type) of the member
MethodKindpublicKind of the method (constructor, getter, regular method ...)
OperatorCSharpSymbolpublicC# operator symbol for operator method
ParameterspublicMethod parameters
RefKindpublicMethod's return ref kind (none, ref)
ReturnsByRefpublicFlag whether the methods returns by reference
ReturnsByRefReadonlypublicFlag whether the methods returns by read only reference (ref readonly)
ReturnsVoidpublicFlags whether the method returns void
ReturnTypeRefpublicType reference of the method return type
TypeParameterspublicType parameters for generic methods

MethodParameterBuilder Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\MethodParameterBuilder.cs

Builder for MethodParameter

public class MethodParameterBuilder

Inheritance: object

Remarks

Used for delegate parameters as well as the delegate is actually a type encapsulating the Invoke method

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AttributespublicParameter attributes definition (including the parameters).
ExplicitDefaultValuepublicParameter's explicitly defined default value (when available)
HasExplicitDefaultValuepublicFlag whether the parameter has explicitly defined default value
IsOptionalpublicFlag whether the parameter is optional
IsParamspublicFlag whether the parameter is with params modifier
IsThispublicFlag whether the parameter is with this modifier
NamepublicName of the parameter
RefKindpublicInformation whether the parameter is "by reference" with the reference kind (None, Ref, Out,In)
TypeRefpublicType reference for the parameter's type

ModelBuilder Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\ModelBuilder.cs

Code model builder

public static class ModelBuilder

Inheritance: object

Methods

NameModifierSummary
Build(ISymbol, RootMemberBuilder, AssemblyMemberBuilder, NamespaceMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticWalks through the Roslyn symbols hierarchy and prepares the member builders hierarchy into the given root builder.
BuildAssembly(IAssemblySymbol, RootMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the AssemblyMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to Assemblies
BuildEvent(IEventSymbol, RootMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the EventMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to ContentMembers
BuildField(IFieldSymbol, RootMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the FieldMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to ContentMembers
BuildFromProjectSourcesAsync(string, IEnumerable<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.AddOns.IAddOn>)public staticBuilds a code model for C# project
BuildMethod(IMethodSymbol, RootMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the MethodMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to ContentMembers
BuildNamespace(INamespaceSymbol, RootMemberBuilder, AssemblyMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the NamespaceMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to Namespaces
BuildProperty(IPropertySymbol, RootMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the PropertyMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to ContentMembers
BuildType(INamedTypeSymbol, RootMemberBuilder, AssemblyMemberBuilder, NamespaceMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int)private staticPrepares the TypeMemberBuilder from the symbol and adds it to Types
GetMethodParameters(ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol>, RootMemberBuilder, bool)private staticGets the list of method parameters (also used for retrieving delegate and indexer parameters)
GetTypeParameters(ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeParameterSymbol>, RootMemberBuilder)private staticGets the list of type parameters for generic type or generic method

Go to namespaces or types

ModelBuilder.Build(ISymbol, RootMemberBuilder, AssemblyMemberBuilder, NamespaceMemberBuilder, TypeMemberBuilder, int) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: ModelBuilder
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\ModelBuilder.cs

Walks through the Roslyn symbols hierarchy and prepares the member builders hierarchy into the given root builder.

private static void Build(ISymbol symbol, RootMemberBuilder root, AssemblyMemberBuilder assembly, NamespaceMemberBuilder ns, TypeMemberBuilder type, int level)
Method parameters
Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ISymbol symbol
Symbol to process
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder root
Root builder
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.AssemblyMemberBuilder assembly
Containing assembly builder
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.NamespaceMemberBuilder ns
Containing namespace builder
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.TypeMemberBuilder type
Containing type builder (used for nested types)
int level
Hierarchy level (used to indent the console output)

Return value

void

Go to namespaces or types

ModelBuilder.GetMethodParameters(ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol>, RootMemberBuilder, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: ModelBuilder
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\ModelBuilder.cs

Gets the list of method parameters (also used for retrieving delegate and indexer parameters)

private static List<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.MethodParameter> GetMethodParameters(ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol> parameterSymbols, RootMemberBuilder root, bool isExtensionMethod = false)
Method parameters
System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol> parameterSymbols
Method parameter symbols
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder root
Root builder
bool isExtensionMethod
Flag whether the parameterSymbols are of an extension method

Return value

List<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.MethodParameter>
List of method parameters

Remarks

As Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol.IsThis doesn't provide the correct info, there is a workaround and IsThis is set for the first param of an extension method. The isExtensionMethod must be set to true to apply the workaround (the default value is false)

Go to namespaces or types

ModelBuilder.GetTypeParameters(ImmutableArray<Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ITypeParameterSymbol>, RootMemberBuilder) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: ModelBuilder
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\ModelBuilder.cs

Gets the list of type parameters for generic type or generic method

Method parameters

Type parameter symbols
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.RootMemberBuilder root
Root builder

Return value

List<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeParameter>

RootMemberBuilder Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: CodeModel\Builder\RootMemberBuilder.cs

Builder for RootMember

public class RootMemberBuilder : MemberBuilder

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Builder.MemberBuilder

Properties

NameModifierSummary
AllTypeRefspublicList of all type references used within the code model
AssembliespublicList of all assemblies defined within the code model
BaseMainFilepublicName of the main (index) file without the path and extension
CompilationFilespublicList of all source files in compilation
MemberKindpublicKind (type) of the member
ProjectRootDirpublicFull path to the project root directory
SplitFileTypepublicInformation whether and how to split the output (none, per namespace, per type)

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
RootMemberBuilder()publicCTOR - sets the name to <ROOT>

Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: Markup\HtmlMarkupProvider.cs

public class HtmlMarkupProvider : IMarkupProvider

Inheritance: object
Implements: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.IMarkupProvider

Properties

NameModifierSummary
ExtensionpublicGets the extension of file generated by markup provider

NameModifierSummary

HtmlMarkupProvider.Code(string, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: HtmlMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\HtmlMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for multi-line code with given text

public virtual string Code(string text, bool encodeNeeded = false)
Method parameters
string text
Code
bool encodeNeeded
Flag whether it's the text needs the HTML encoding (the code from XML documentation comments should already be encoded, the code from generator needs encoding)

Return value

string
Markup for code with given text
Implements: IMarkupProvider.Code(string, bool)

Remarks

Writes <pre>{InlineCode(text)}</pre> to the output

See Also

InlineCode(string, bool)

HtmlMarkupProvider.DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: HtmlMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\HtmlMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for the description list with the given items

public virtual string DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string> itemTerm, Func<TItemType,string> itemDescription, IEnumerable<TItemType> items)
Type parameters
TItemType
Type of the object to generate the description list item for
Method parameters
System.Func<TItemType,string> itemTerm
Function to get the term for given item
System.Func<TItemType,string> itemDescription
Function to get the description for given item
IEnumerable<TItemType> items
Description list items

Return value

string
Markup for the description list with the given items
Implements: IMarkupProvider.DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>)

Remarks

Renders the individual items using DescriptionListItem<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, HtmlMarkupProvider.TItemType) and then uses DescriptionList(IList<string>) to render the whole list

Go to namespaces or types

Writes "<br />" + Environment.NewLine to the output

string text
Link text

Name of the file relative to the documentation root (index file)
string bookmark
Optional bookmark

Return value

string
Markup for the internal link
Implements: IMarkupProvider.Link(string, string, string)

Remarks

MarkdownMarkupProvider Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: Markup\MarkdownMarkupProvider.cs

Markdown markup provider

public class MarkdownMarkupProvider : IMarkupProvider

Inheritance: object
Implements: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.IMarkupProvider

Properties

NameModifierSummary
ExtensionpublicGets the extension of file generated by markup provider

Constructors

Methods

NameModifierSummary

MarkdownMarkupProvider.Bold(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkdownMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\MarkdownMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for bold (strong) text

public virtual string Bold(string text)
Method parameters
string text
Content

Return value

string
Markup for bold (strong) text
Implements: IMarkupProvider.Bold(string)

Remarks

Writes <strong>{text}</strong> to the output. There are problems when markdown "tags" are used within HTML tags (for example in description lists), so better to use the HTML tags for bold text as well

Go to namespaces or types

Implements: IMarkupProvider.Bookmark(string)

Remarks

Remarks

MarkdownMarkupProvider.DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkdownMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\MarkdownMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for the description list with the given items

public virtual string DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string> itemTerm, Func<TItemType,string> itemDescription, IEnumerable<TItemType> items)
Type parameters
TItemType
Type of the object to generate the description list item for
Method parameters
System.Func<TItemType,string> itemTerm
Function to get the term for given item
System.Func<TItemType,string> itemDescription
Function to get the description for given item
IEnumerable<TItemType> items
Description list items

Return value

string
Markup for the description list with the given items
Implements: IMarkupProvider.DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>)

Remarks

Renders the individual items using DescriptionListItem<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, MarkdownMarkupProvider.TItemType) and then uses DescriptionList(IList<string>) to render the whole list

Go to namespaces or types

MarkdownMarkupProvider.Link(string, string, string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkdownMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\MarkdownMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for the internal link

public virtual string Link(string text, string file, string bookmark)
Method parameters
string text
Link text
string file
Name of the file relative to the documentation root (index file)
string bookmark
Optional bookmark

Return value

string
Markup for the internal link
Implements: IMarkupProvider.Link(string, string, string)

Remarks

Writes [{text}]({file}{(string.IsNullOrEmpty(bookmark) ? "" : $"#{bookmark}")}) to the output

Go to namespaces or types

MarkdownMarkupProvider.List<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkdownMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\MarkdownMarkupProvider.cs

Returns the markup for the list of the items

public virtual string List<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string> itemOutput, IEnumerable<TItemType> items, bool numbered = false)
Type parameters
TItemType
Type of the list item entry object
Method parameters
System.Func<TItemType,string> itemOutput
Function returning the markup for single item
IEnumerable<TItemType> items
List items
bool numbered
Flag whether the list is to be numbered (ordered). If false bullet list (unordered) will be generated

Return value

string
Markup for the list of the items
Implements: IMarkupProvider.List<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>, bool)

Remarks

Writes {(numbered ? $"{idx}." : " -")} {itemOutput.Invoke(item)}{Environment.NewLine} for each item with additional new lines before and after the list

Go to namespaces or types

Content of the paragraph

Return value

string
Markup for paragraph with given text
Implements: IMarkupProvider.Para(string)

Remarks

Writes text + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine to the output when the text is provided (so no empty paragraphs are generated)

MarkupFileWriter Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: Markup\MarkupFileWriter.cs

Markup output single file writer

public class MarkupFileWriter : BaseDisposable, IMarkupWriter

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Utils.BaseDisposable
Derived: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.MarkupMultiFileWriter
Implements: IDisposable, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.IMarkupWriter, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.INonWritableWriter

Properties

NameModifierSummary
IsInProgresspublicFlag whether the output is currently being generated
TargetpublicFull path to the target output file
WriterprotectedUnderlying System.IO.StreamWriter used to write the output to the file.

Methods

NameModifierSummary
DisposeManaged()protectedDisposes the markup writer - flush the output, close the output file and dispose the underlying stream writer
SetTarget(string)publicSets the target of the markdown writer
Split(string)publicStarts a new split of the output - it's ignored for the single file output
WriteAsync(string)publicWrites the text to the output
WriteLineAsync(string)publicWrites the text and a new line to the output
WriteModelAsync(Func<System.Threading.Tasks.Task>)publicWrites the code model to the output

MarkupFileWriter.SetTarget(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupFileWriter
Sources: Markup\MarkupFileWriter.cs

Sets the target of the markdown writer

public virtual bool SetTarget(string fileName)
Method parameters
string fileName
Full path to the file (including the extension) to write the output to

Return value

bool
True when the target has been set, otherwise false (because the output is in progress)
Implements: INonWritableWriter.SetTarget(string)

Remarks

The Target is the full path to the output file. The target can't be set when the output is being generated

MarkupGenerator Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Markup generator

public class MarkupGenerator

Inheritance: object

Remarks

Here is the overall look and feel of documentation implemented. The MarkupGenerator is the traversing the code model, building the documentation and render the output for individual parts using the Markup provider

The term "page" used with the generator simply means the documentation for single member even if the whole documentation might be rendered into single file

Properties

NameModifierSummary
BaseFileNameprotectedName of the (main) file
FileNameprotectedFull path to the (main) file
MarkupprotectedIMarkupProvider used to render the markup
ModelprotectedRoot of the code model
OptionspublicOutput configuration
TitleprotectedDocumentation title shown at the top of each page
WriterprotectedUnderlying output writer.

Constructors

NameModifierSummary
MarkupGenerator(string, RootMember, IMarkupProvider)publicCTOR

Methods

NameModifierSummary
DerivedInfo(TypeMember)protectedRenders the info about the type members that directly inherits from the type member if available
ImplementedByInfo(TypeMember)protectedRenders the info about the type members that implements the given type (interface) if available
ImplementsInfo(TypeContentMember)protectedRenders the info about the implemented members/symbols with link if available
OverrideInfo(TypeContentMember)protectedRenders the info about the overriden member/symbol with link if available
Split(string)public[Deprecated] Initializes a new split. Split is deprecated, please use SplitAsync instead.
SplitAsync(string)publicInitializes a new split. When splitting is not required, it's ignored (no split generated)
TypeRefWithLink(TypeRef, bool)protectedRenders the type reference ( TypeRef ) with link if available
TypRefHierarchyWithLinks(TypeRef, string, bool)protectedRenders the type hierarchy from the "very base type" to the type represented by given typeRef
WriteAddOnsBodyAsync(Member)protectedWrites the add-on page bodies (if provided)
WriteConstantsTableAsync(string, ICollection<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.FieldMember>)protectedWrites the table with given list of constants
WriteDocumentationExampleAsync(Member)protectedWrites the Example documentation section for given member if available
WriteDocumentationExceptionsAsync(Member)protectedWrites the Exceptions documentation section for given member if available
WriteDocumentationRemarksAsync(Member)protectedWrites the Remarks documentation section for given member if available
WriteDocumentationSeeAlsoAsync(Member)protectedWrites the See Also documentation section for given member if available
WriteEventAsync(EventMember)protectedWrites the event documentation page
WriteFieldAsync(FieldMember)protectedWrites the field documentation page
WriteMembersTableAsync(string, ICollection<net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.Member>)protectedWrites the table with given list of members
WriteMethodAsync(MethodMember)protectedWrites the method documentation page
WriteModelAsync(string)publicMain code model rendering public end point. Writes the model into the documentation file(s)
WriteModelContentAsync()protectedWrites the code model into the output
WriteNamespaceAsync(NamespaceMember)protectedWrites the namespace documentation page
WriteNamespacesAsync()protectedWrites the namespaces and their members into the output
WriteNamespacesListAsync()protectedWrites the table of all namespaces within the code model into the output
WritePageFooter()public[Deprecated] Writes the page footer. WritePageFooter is deprecated, please use WritePageFooterAsync instead.
WritePageFooterAsync()publicWrites the page footer
WritePropertyAsync(PropertyMember)protectedWrites the property documentation page
WriteTypeAsync(TypeMember)protectedWrites the type documentation page
WriteTypeContentMemberHeaderAsync(TypeContentMember, string)protectedWrites the header for the type member (field, method, etc.)
WriteTypeHeaderAsync(TypeMember)protectedWrites the header for the type member (field, method, etc.)
WriteTypesAsync(NamespaceMember)protectedWrites the types and their members contained within given namespace into the output
WriteTypesListAsync()protectedWrites the table of all types within the code model into the output

Go to namespaces or types

MarkupGenerator.Split(string) Method

Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

[Deprecated] Initializes a new split. Split is deprecated, please use SplitAsync instead.

[Obsolete("Split is deprecated, please use SplitAsync instead.")]
public virtual async Task Split(string splitName)
Method parameters
string splitName

Return value

System.Threading.Tasks.Task
Async task
Attributes: System.ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

The functionality of SplitAsync(string) remains the same, just the name of the method has been corrected

Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupGenerator
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Renders the type reference ( TypeRef ) with link if available

protected virtual string TypeRefWithLink(TypeRef typeRef, bool includeNamespace = true)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeRef typeRef
Type reference to render
bool includeNamespace
Flag whether to include the namespace in the member name shown

Return value

string
Rendered type reference ( TypeRef ) with link if available

Remarks

When the typeRef is related to a member from code model, the link to the member is created. Otherwise, the will try to resolve the link to MS API online documentation using GetLink(TypeRef) . When the link can't be built, just member's name is returned as a plain text.

Go to namespaces or types

MarkupGenerator.TypRefHierarchyWithLinks(TypeRef, string, bool) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupGenerator
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Renders the type hierarchy from the "very base type" to the type represented by given typeRef

protected virtual string TypRefHierarchyWithLinks(TypeRef typeRef, string separator, bool includeNamespace = true)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.TypeRef typeRef
Type reference to render the type hierarchy for
string separator
Inheritance separator
bool includeNamespace
Flag whether to include the namespace in the member name shown

Return value

string
Rendered type hierarchy from the "very base type" to the type represented by given typeRef

Remarks

Uses TypeRefWithLink(TypeRef, bool) to render individual parts of hierarchy

Main code model rendering public end point. Writes the model into the documentation file(s)

public virtual async Task WriteModelAsync(string title)
Method parameters
string title
Documentation title shown at the top of each page

Return value

System.Threading.Tasks.Task
Async task

Remarks

Initializes MarkupFileWriter or MarkupMultiFileWriter based on the split configuration. Executes the model rendering sequence.

MarkupGenerator.WriteModelContentAsync() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupGenerator
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Writes the code model into the output

protected virtual async Task WriteModelContentAsync()

Return value

System.Threading.Tasks.Task
Async task

Remarks

Writes the namespaces and types lists and calls WriteNamespacesAsync() to walk through the code model and generate the documentation for individual members

Go to namespaces or types

MarkupGenerator.WriteNamespaceAsync(NamespaceMember) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupGenerator
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Writes the namespace documentation page

protected virtual async Task WriteNamespaceAsync(NamespaceMember ns)
Method parameters
net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.CodeModel.NamespaceMember ns
Namespace to document

Return value

System.Threading.Tasks.Task
Async task

Remarks

The namespace XML documentation comments are not available for the namespace itself. To document the namespace, create a class NamespaceDoc within the namespace and add the namespace documentation to this class. It's recommended to mark the class with System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilerGeneratedAttribute , so it will be excluded from the documentation as a type (meaning, the documentation will be applied to namespace and the class itself will not appear in the documentation).

When a split per namespace or per type is required, the new split is initialized at the beginning of the execution

Go to namespaces or types

MarkupGenerator.WriteNamespacesAsync() Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupGenerator
Sources: Markup\MarkupGenerator.cs

Writes the namespaces and their members into the output

protected virtual async Task WriteNamespacesAsync()

Return value

System.Threading.Tasks.Task
Async task

Remarks

Walks through the namespaces and for each, the namespace page and namespace members' pages are rendered into the output

Go to namespaces or types

Sources: Markup\MarkupMultiFileWriter.cs

Markup output multi file writer

public class MarkupMultiFileWriter : MarkupFileWriter

Inheritance: object -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Utils.BaseDisposable -> net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.MarkupFileWriter
Implements: IDisposable, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.IMarkupWriter, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.INonWritableWriter

Properties

NameModifierSummary
CurrentFilepublicFull path of the file the output is currently being written to
ExtensionpublicExtension of the output files

Methods

NameModifierSummary
SetTarget(string)publicSets the target directory of the markdown writer (directory of index file provided in indexFileName )
Split(string)publicStarts a new split of the output - closes the current file and opens a new one having the splitName and Extension
WriteModelAsync(Func<System.Threading.Tasks.Task>)publicWrites the code model to the output

MarkupMultiFileWriter.SetTarget(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MarkupMultiFileWriter
Sources: Markup\MarkupMultiFileWriter.cs

Sets the target directory of the markdown writer (directory of index file provided in indexFileName )

public override bool SetTarget(string indexFileName)
Method parameters
string indexFileName
Full path to the index file (including the extension) to write the output to

Return value

bool
True when the target has been set, otherwise false (because the output is in progress)
Overrides: MarkupFileWriter.SetTarget(string)

Remarks

The Target is the full path to the directory to write the output files to Clears the files having the same extension as the given indexFileName from the target directory The target can't be set when the output is being generated.

Go to namespaces or types

MarkupMultiFileWriter.Split(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup

IMarkupProvider Interface

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: Markup\IMarkupProvider.cs

Markup provider interface

public interface IMarkupProvider

Implemented by: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.HtmlMarkupProvider, net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup.MarkdownMarkupProvider

Properties

NameModifierSummary
Extensionpublic abstractGets the extension of file generated by markup provider
MarkupWriterpublic abstractGets or sets the IMarkupWriter used for the markup output

Methods

NameModifierSummary
Bold(string)public abstractReturns the markup for bold (strong) text
Bookmark(string)public abstractReturns the markup of the bookmark with given id
Code(string, bool)public abstractReturns the markup for multi-line code with given text
DescriptionList(IList<string>)public abstractReturns the markup for the description list with the given renderedItems
DescriptionList<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>)public abstractReturns the markup for the description list with the given items
DescriptionListItem(string, string)public abstractReturns the markup of the description list item
DescriptionListItem<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, Func<TItemType,string>, IMarkupProvider.TItemType)public abstractReturns the markup of the description list item
ExternalLink(string, string)public abstractReturns the markup for the external link
InlineCode(string, bool)public abstractReturns the markup for inline code with given text
Italic(string)public abstractReturns the markup for italic (emphasized) text
LineBreak()public abstractReturns the markup for the line break
Link(string, Member)public abstractReturns the markup for the internal link
Link(string, string, string)public abstractReturns the markup for the internal link
List<TItemType>(Func<TItemType,string>, IEnumerable<TItemType>, bool)public abstractReturns the markup for the list of the items
Para(string)public abstractReturns the markup for paragraph with given text
Small(string)public abstractReturns the markup for small text
TableCols(string[])public abstractReturns the markup for the table row with given columns
TableFooter()public abstractReturns the markup for the table footer
TableHeader(string[])public abstractReturns the markup for the table header with given columns
Text(string)public abstractReturns the markup for the "plain" text
WriteCodeAsync(string, bool)public abstractWrites the markup for multi-line code with given text
WriteDocumentEndAsync()public abstractWrites the markup for the end of the document (file)
WriteDocumentStartAsync(string)public abstractWrites the markup for the beginning of the document (file)
WriteH1Async(string, string)public abstractWrites the level 1 header with optional bookmark
WriteH2Async(string, string)public abstractWrites the level 2 header with optional bookmark
WriteH3Async(string, string)public abstractWrites the level 3 header with optional bookmark
WriteH4Async(string, string)public abstractWrites the level 4 header with optional bookmark
WriteHorizontalLineAsync()public abstractWrites the markup for horizontal line
WriteParaAsync(string)public abstractWrites the markup for paragraph with given text
WriteTableColsAsync(string[])public abstractWrites the markup for the table row with given columns
WriteTableFooterAsync()public abstractWrites the markup for the table footer
WriteTableHeaderAsync(string[])public abstractWrites the markup for the table header with given columns
WriteTextAsync(string)public abstractWrites the text to the output

IMarkupProvider.Link(string, string, string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.Markup
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: IMarkupProvider
Sources: Markup\IMarkupProvider.cs

net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.MsApiDoc Namespace

MS online API links helper classes

Classes

NameModifierSummary
MsApiDocEnginepublicProvides the links to MS API browser (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/) for .NET API types and their members.
MsApiDocOptionspublicConfiguration class for MsApiDocEngine

Go to namespaces or types

MsApiDocEngine Class

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.MsApiDoc
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Sources: MsApiDoc\MsApiDocEngine.cs

Provides the links to MS API browser (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/) for .NET API types and their members.

public class MsApiDocEngine

Inheritance: object

Remarks

The Roslyn compiler uses the member ID in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ISymbol.GetDocumentationCommentId , (even if there is no documentation), so it's possible to use such ID as member identifier for types, properties, methods, etc. Method ReadLocalDoc() uses the local clone of .NET API documentation (https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs) and checks for the framework index file containing the list of available IDs. It generates the links for each ID and store it in the internal dictionary(ID,link) telling "these IDs are documented at MS site and these are the links" .

The links can be retrieved using the static methods GetLink(string) by ID or GetLink(TypeRef) by TypeRef . It checks, whether the ID exists in local MS documentation clone and if positive, it uses the generated link stored in internal dictionary. When the local clone is not available (or it's use is suppressed), the engine will try to build the links based on the namespace and name of member for limited set of members.

Note: The links are created based on the "observation" how they are composed at the MS API site, so it's best effort approach and the links are not granted to be hundred percent correct. Also the API Browser don't have the pages/anchors for constants (including the enum items), so the generated links will not work in this case.

The behavior of engine can be configured using the MsApiDocOptions configuration class

To get the best results, clone the .NET API documentation from https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs to local directory. And configure the engine

  • LinkToApi - Set to true , to allow the links to MS Api (if false, no links will be created at all)
  • ApiBaseUrl - It's set to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/. As far as there is no change at MS side, no need to configure. Note: The URL must end with "/".
  • RequireLocalDoc - Set to true to minimize the false links. Note: set to false allowing the engine to try to create the links even if not found in local documentation
  • LocalDocDir - Path to the local clone of MS documentation (directory must contain xml\FrameworksIndex subdirectory

Properties

NameModifierSummary
BaseUrlpublic static
IdToLinkDictionarypublic staticID to Link read-only dictionary for items read from local clone of MS .NET API documentation
IdToLinkDictionaryPrivateprivate staticInternal ID to Link dictionary for items read from local clone of MS .NET API documentation

Methods

NameModifierSummary
GetLink(string)public staticRetrieves the link to MS API online documentation based on the member id (documentation ID)
GetLink(TypeRef)public staticRetrieves the link to MS API online documentation based on the typeRef .
ReadLocalDoc()public staticReads the local clone of MS .NET API documentation and builds the internal dictionary of member IDs and links to MS online API documentation
TypeMemberBaseName(string)private staticExtracts the base name for the type member.

Go to namespaces or types

MsApiDocEngine.GetLink(string) Method

Namespace: net.adamec.dev.markupdoc.MsApiDoc
Assembly: MarkupDoc
Type: MsApiDocEngine
Sources: MsApiDoc\MsApiDocEngine.cs

Retrieves the link to MS API online documentation based on the member id (documentation ID)

public static string GetLink(string id)
Method parameters
